room_title: Escape room "Meltdown" by Escape the Room Denver in Denver
review: We had so much fun in the nuclear meltdown room! We won... but not by much! Kept us guessing and working together to complete the escape. Would definitely recommend!!

room_title: Escape room "Meltdown" by Escape the Room Denver in Denver
review: I took my staff of 6 here for a team-building evening and we had such a great time! The hostess was great and we all had a great experience! I would definitely go back in the future with family, friends or my staff again!

room_title: Escape room "Meltdown" by Escape the Room Denver in Denver
review: We did the Meltdown room. It was a Challenging room. Had a great time!! Makes you really think outside the box. Team work is a must. Will definitely go back and try the other rooms.
